text:
New roasted delights at this coffeeshop. Try try.

Ordered a chicken curry mee, 3 combination platter for 1 and plate of dry mee.
They served a good chicken curry mee at $5 albeit slightly oily as you can see from picture. The white chicken served in curry mee was really good and tender.
All 3 roasted meats in the platter was good. Char siew had that slight char which I prefer in my char siews. The sweet caramelisation is there as well. Sauce complimented it.
Roast duck is a herbal one which when bitten into, you can totally taste the herbal flavours. Duck meat was tender as well.
Roast pork was chopped in bigger than average pieces. There was a good ratio of fats and meat. Skin was crispy good. Will order the roast pork again on my next visit.

The separate noodles had a nice sauce but felt that it was slightly dry. Maybe can ask for more sauce next time.

Overall good stall, will eat again.

3 star for service because I get the feeling the guy whom took my order dint felt like serving at all.
Ordered the Char Siew Roasted Pork Rice. The taste was average.
This stall served good roasted meat. Have tried their wonton noodles and char Siew and roasted pork belly rice. Both quite good.
Family agreed that the roasted pork and char siew here are very good - crispy and fragrant  !

Decided to patronize this coffee shop in Fernvale near my house for the first time.  Ordered duck and roast pork rice for $5.  Meat is good amount. Duck meat is tender. roast pork is crispy without porky taste. Pardon the presentation cos I messed it up before taking photos.  Will come again when I crave for roasted meat.
